content.raw: Ign-fuel is under development so this will probably not be available for a long time. I think ideally we wouldn't require an internet connection to run the tests, but if we must, we could use `https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/raw/default/number1/model.sdf` instead?
content.html: Ign-fuel is under development so this will probably not be available for a long time. I think ideally we wouldn't require an internet connection to run the tests, but if we must, we could use https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/raw/default/number1/model.sdf instead?

How about:

if (this.customUrls.length !== 0)
{
 ...
}
else if (modelName !== undefined)
{
  modelFile = this.MATERIAL_ROOT + '/' + modelName + '/model.sdf';
}
else
{
  console.error('Must provide either `this.customUrls` or `modelFile`');
}

content.html: Actually sorry, we will make a request to an empty url

content.raw: The new way of using this function seems to be "if `modelName` is undefined, it will load from `customUris`". But what if both are undefined? What if both are *defined*? The API is a bit confusing. We could either document it or somehow split the function. And we should definitely handle the case when neither is defined, because then we will make a request to `this.MATERIAL_ROOT + '//model.sdf'`
content.html: The new way of using this function seems to be "if modelName is undefined, it will load from customUris". But what if both are undefined? What if both are defined? The API is a bit confusing. We could either document it or somehow split the function. And we should definitely handle the case when neither is defined, because then we will make a request to this.MATERIAL_ROOT + '//model.sdf'

They're triggered when you click on the scene, I see this on the console:

One hacky solution I can think about for now is to wrap these calls with `if (GZ3D.Gui !== undefined)`

ReferenceError: $ is not defined

One hacky solution I can think about for now is to wrap these calls with if (GZ3D.Gui !== undefined)

    $('input[type="radio"]').checkboxradio('refresh');
    $( '#rotate-mode' ).click();
    $('input[type="radio"]').checkboxradio('refresh');
    $( '#translate-mode' ).click();
